name: Malaya Dutta Borah
content: Faculty Details Dr. Malaya Dutta Borah Information Designation : Assistant Professor, Grade-I Email : malayaduttaborah@cse.nits.ac.in Phone : Key Notes Conference: International - 47 , National - 4 Journals: 30 Conferences: 54 Book Chapters: 8 Books: 7 Patents: 5 PhD: Guided: 13 Post Graduates: Guided: 15 Under Graduates: Guided: 19 Cited byView allAllSince 2020Citations21041759h-index2222i10-index3330054027013540520132014201520162017201820192020202120222023202420252235336274564368150260358539369 99 PUBLICATIONS 13 DOCTORAL STUDENTS 5 PATENTS 3 PROJECTS Introduction [Biosketch] Dr. Malaya Dutta Borah received her B. Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering from the North Eastern Regional Institute of Science and Technology (NERIST), Govt. of India in 2002, Master of Engineering with distinction from Delhi College of Engineering (DCE) in 2011, and Ph.D. from Delhi Technological University (DTU) in 2017. Dr. Malaya Dutta Borah is currently working as an Assistant Professor Grade-I in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, National Institute of Technology Silchar, Assam, India. Her research areas include Block Chain Technology, Data Mining, Cloud Computing and e-Governance. She is the author of 98 papers including in reputed journals, Book Chapters, various National and International Conferences. 03 PhD Scholars have completed their research work under her. She is the Editor in 4 multi-authored edited books published by IGI Global, Springer and CRC Press. She has 4 granted patents. She was the Organizing chair of International Conferences (IEEE SILCON 2023, BigDML 2021, BigDML 2019 etc.). She is one of the founder members of IEEE Silchar Subsection. She has completed one Project from Council of National Institutes of Technology, Science Education and Research (NITSER), Ministry of Education, Government of India. She has received Prof. Priti Shankar Stree Shakti Samman 2022 for being feminine faculty of ICT (#girlsinICT day), awarded by ReTHINK INDIA INSTITUTE,www.rethinkindia.org on April 28, 2022. Apart from the academic duty, she is actively involved with Students related activity and Institute level administrative duty. She was Associate Dean (Students Welfare) from 30/11/2022 to 12/12/2024. She is a member of Professional bodies like IEEE and CSI. Areas of Interest Data Mining Machine Learning Cloud Computing Blockchain Technology e-Governance System EDUCATION QUALIFICATION Institution Year Degree North Eastern Regional Institute of Science and Technology, Arunachal Pradesh (Under the Ministry of Human Resource Development, Govt. of India) 2002 B.
